Summary: bright star like object that caught eye because if flshed around 8 dif colors rapidly
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Abbeville
There was one other sighting in Abbeville on or around August 24th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking my trash out and north north east maybe 5 to 10 miles maybe less I noticeed what appeared at first to be a star well I then noticed while gazing at it it dropped from its original position I immediately screamed for my mothe and she also witnessed the single object was changing positions in the sky I proceeded to watch this object for over 30 minutes its probably still out there as IM writing this but no doubt its a genuine sighting.I also noticed that kind of in a formation pattern of a triangle theres 2 more objects which I observed having the same characteristics as the first blinking jerking back and fourth quickly and flashing a multitude of brilliant colors IV seen small ufos before but never for this long a time period I estimate thes objects to be just over the eufaula alabama area from where Im located maybe a little east of ther but IM not certain feel free to contact me if you like I will be seeing these objects again I hope and will report any further acticvity to this site thanks JB
